AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States of America: country involved in the appeal process, conceding to a deadline failure and arguing the materiality requirement, acting as prosecutor
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Laredo, Texas: location where a federal grand jury returned an indictment and where Raul Rafael Arce-Jasso was stopped by a border patrol checkpoint, 15 miles south of which the checkpoint is located on I-35
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.I-35: highway where the border patrol checkpoint is located, near Laredo, Texas
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.San Antonio: destination of Raul Rafael Arce-Jasso's trip
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.border patrol checkpoint on I-35 near La: checkpoint where Raul Rafael Arce-Jasso was initially stopped and questioned by Agent Jesus Garcia and where his detention was argued to be unconstitutionally lengthy
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.primary inspection lane at the border pa: lane where Agent Jesus Garcia was manning when Raul Rafael Arce-Jasso pulled up
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.secondary inspection area at the border: area where a canine alerted and agents discovered cocaine hidden in the side panel of Raul Rafael Arce-Jasso's car
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.District Court: court with jurisdiction over the case and whose decision is being appealed by the United States of America
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.court of appeals: appellate court with jurisdiction over appeals from district courts
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.district court: trial court where evidence was suppressed or excluded and whose decision is under appeal
